name: Prohibition (dontlikesand433)
description:
THIS IS THE OPEN ALPHA/BETA 

To interact with NPC's, signs and items, hover over them and press E.

SHIFT to sprint

W A S D to move

Feel free to leave comments for us to see and implement

An in-progress game me and my friend are working on. We mainly posted it here for feedback and we will be posting new builds almost weekly. If you're interested, feel free to donate.

This game will have story, we wont be making it public until launch and it will be available on the paid version.

One of the key aspects of the game will be the procedurally generated npc stories. We want to make a game with traditional combat, but one where every interaction you have with an npc has an actual impact on gameplay and presents new challenges.

If you want more details about what we're doing, check out the development log.
